abstract: What are those crazy venture capitalists in Silicon valley up to these days when they are not listening to pitches and signing deals? Kiteboarding, apparently. Bloomberg News takes a look at the sport, which has seduced the likes of Google co-founders Sergey Brin and Larry Page, as well as a slew of venture capitalists, private equity pros and investment bankers.
lead_paragraph: What are those crazy venture capitalists in Silicon valley up to these days when they are not listening to pitches and signing deals? Kiteboarding, apparently.
